###Aperio CS2 Whole Slide Scanner
**Objective Lens:** 20x/0.75 NA Plan Apo 
**Scanning Resolution:** 50,000 pixels per inch (0.5 Î¼m per pixel with 20x objective).
https://www.evernote.com/shard/s2/nl/168870199/2c66ecd2-a088-440c-a6b5-d37757358b94/

[Aperio CS2 PDF Spec Sheet](evernote:///view/168870199/s2/2c66ecd2-a088-440c-a6b5-d37757358b94/2c66ecd2-a088-440c-a6b5-d37757358b94/)

###Pathologist Field of View
Andrew utilizes a Nikon Eclipse 50i with the CF160 optical system with a F.N. of 22
$F.O.V. (Diameter)= \frac{Eyepiece F.N.}{M(ob)^{*}}(mm)\\ \text{M(ob): Objective lens magnification}\\ \text{F.N.: Field Number}$
F.N.22 Eyepiece With 20X Objective: $\frac{22}{20X}=1.1mm = 1100 \mu m\\ {1100 \mu m}*2^{*}= 2,200 \text{ pixels diameter}\\* .5 \mu m \text{ per pixel}$
F.N.22 Eyepiece With 4X Objective: $\frac{22}{5X}=5.5mm = 5500 \mu m\\ {5500 \mu m}*2^{*}= 11,000 \text{ pixels diameter}\\* .5 \mu m \text{ per pixel}$
